# Renovo Cape - Bath Resurfacing & Bathtub Reglazing Cape Town

> Best bath resurfacing company in Cape Town! Professional bath re-enameling, bathtub reglazing, and bathroom restoration services with over 60 years of combined experience. Make your old bath look new with our 5-year warranty. Alternative to replacing a bath - 50-70% cheaper!

Renovo Cape is Cape Town's premier bath resurfacing and bathtub reglazing specialist, serving the entire Western Cape. We deliver expert bath re-enameling, enamel bath repair, and bathroom restoration services for homeowners, landlords, and businesses. Our highly qualified team specializes in making old baths look new through professional resurfacing - a cost-effective alternative to replacing a bath.

## Why Choose Renovo Cape

- **Best Bath Resurfacing Company in Cape Town**: Over 60 years of combined experience
- **5-Year Warranty**: Comprehensive warranty on all bath re-enameling work
- **50-70% Cheaper**: Save thousands compared to bath replacement
- **Fast Service**: Most jobs completed in 3-5 hours
- **Free Quotes**: No obligation quotes for all projects
- **Mobile Service**: On-site and off-site restoration work available
- **Full Western Cape Coverage**: Serving Cape Town, Southern Suburbs, Northern Suburbs, and beyond

## Core Services

### Bath Resurfacing & Re-enameling
Professional bath resurfacing, bathtub reglazing, and bath re-enameling for all materials:
- Acrylic bath repair and resurfacing
- Enamel bath repair and re-enameling
- Cast iron bath restoration and reglazing
- Fibreglass bath repair and coating
- Porcelain bath resurfacing
- Steel bath re-enameling

**Keywords**: bath resurfacing Cape Town, bathtub reglazing, bath re-enameling, bathroom resurfacing, bathtub resurfacing, bath restoration

### Sink & Basin Repair
Fix cracked sinks, chipped basins, and damaged counter-tops:
- Cracked sink repair (porcelain, ceramic, enamel, acrylic)
- Chipped basin repair and restoration
- Kitchen sink repair and resurfacing
- Bathroom sink restoration
- Vanity basin repair
- Counter-top sink repair

**Keywords**: fix cracked sink, cracked sink repair, chipped sink repair, basin repair, sink repair Cape Town

### Bathroom Restoration Services
Complete bathroom restoration and repair services:
- Fix peeling bath coating
- Repair cracked bath enamel
- Restore rusted bath (cast iron specialists)
- Bath chip repair and filling
- Crack and hole refillings
- Polishing of baths, sinks, and fixtures
- Shower tray resurfacing and repair
- Toilet resurfacing and repair

**Keywords**: bathroom restoration Cape Town, fix peeling bath coating, repair cracked bath enamel, restore rusted bath, bath chip repair

### Tile & Counter-Top Services
- Tile resurfacing (bathroom and kitchen)
- Shower tray restoration
- Counter-top restoration and resurfacing
- Vanity counter repair
- Epoxy coating applications

### Cupboard & Appliance Services
- Kitchen cupboard respraying
- Bedroom cupboard refinishing
- Appliance resurfacing
- Cabinet restoration

## Service Coverage - Geographic Areas

### Cape Town & Suburbs
- **Cape Town CBD**: City center and surrounding areas
- **Southern Suburbs**: Wynberg, Constantia, Claremont, Tokai, Bergvliet, Kenilworth, Newlands, Rondebosch
- **Northern Suburbs**: Parow (our office), Bellville, Durbanville, Goodwood, Brackenfell, Kraaifontein
- **Atlantic Seaboard**: Sea Point, Camps Bay, Clifton, Bantry Bay, Green Point
- **West Coast**: Milnerton, Table View, Blouberg
- **East**: Stellenbosch, Somerset West, Strand, Gordon's Bay
- **South Peninsula**: Muizenberg, Fish Hoek, Simon's Town, Noordhoek

**Service Radius**: 50km+ from Parow office covering the entire Western Cape

**Keywords**: bath resurfacing Cape Town, bath re-enameling Cape Town, bathtub repair Cape Town, bath restoration Western Cape, bath enamel repair near me, Southern Suburbs bath repair, Northern Suburbs bath resurfacing

## Frequently Asked Questions

### How much does bath re-enameling cost?
Bath re-enameling costs 50-70% less than replacement. Most standard baths cost between R2,500-R4,500 to resurface. Contact us for a free, no-obligation quote.

### Is bath resurfacing worth it?
Absolutely! Bath resurfacing is worth it because it costs 50-70% less than replacement, takes only 3-5 hours instead of days, avoids plumbing work and tile damage, and comes with a 5-year warranty.

### How long does bath resurfacing last?
Bath resurfacing lasts 10-15 years or more with proper care. We provide a 5-year warranty on all bathtub reglazing work.

### Can you fix a cracked sink?
Yes, we specialize in repairing cracked sinks, basins, and counter-tops. We fix chips, cracks, and holes in all types of sanitaryware including porcelain, enamel, acrylic, and ceramic.

### How do you fix peeling bath coating?
We completely remove the old failing coating, repair any underlying damage, thoroughly prepare the surface, and apply a new premium coating with a 5-year warranty.

### Can you repair cracked bath enamel?
Yes, we repair cracked bath enamel using specialized techniques. We stabilize the crack, fill with structural repair compound, and refinish to match the original enamel.

### How do you make an old bath look new?
We make old baths look new through professional bath resurfacing: removing old coatings, repairing all damage, deep cleaning, surface preparation, and applying premium enamel coating.

### Can you restore a rusted bath?
Yes, we restore rusted baths, especially cast iron baths. We remove all rust, treat the metal, repair damage, and apply new enamel coating.

### What is the alternative to replacing a bath?
Bath resurfacing (bathtub reglazing or re-enameling) is the best alternative to replacing a bath. It costs 50-70% less, takes only hours, and delivers like-new results.

### Do you offer bath resurfacing for rentals?
Yes, we offer excellent bath resurfacing services for rental properties. It's affordable, fast (minimal tenant disruption), durable (5-year warranty), and makes old baths look new. Discounted rates for multiple units.

## Materials We Work With

- **Acrylic Baths**: Modern lightweight baths
- **Enamel Baths**: Traditional steel or iron baths with enamel coating
- **Cast Iron Baths**: Heavy-duty vintage and Victorian-style baths
- **Fibreglass Baths**: Composite material baths and shower units
- **Porcelain**: Sinks, toilets, and fixtures
- **Ceramic**: Tiles, sinks, and sanitaryware
- **Steel**: Baths and sinks
- **Composite Materials**: Counter-tops and modern fixtures

## Process & Warranty

### Our Bath Resurfacing Process
1. **Inspection**: Assess bath condition and discuss color options
2. **Preparation**: Deep cleaning and repair of chips or cracks
3. **Resurfacing**: Application of premium coating in chosen color
4. **Curing**: 24-48 hours curing time before use

### Warranty Details
- **5-Year Warranty** on all bath re-enameling work
- Covers defects in materials and workmanship
- Requires proper care and maintenance
- Detailed care instructions provided

### Care Instructions
- Use non-abrasive cleaners
- Clean with soft cloths or sponges
- Avoid dropping heavy objects
- No suction cup bath mats for first month
- Wipe down after use

## Why Bath Resurfacing vs Replacement?

### Bath Resurfacing Benefits
✓ 50-70% cheaper than replacement
✓ Completed in 3-5 hours, not days
✓ No plumbing work required
✓ Minimal disruption to your home
✓ Environmentally friendly
✓ 5-year warranty included
✓ Choose new colors
✓ Like-new appearance

### Replacement Costs
✗ Expensive new bath purchase
✗ Plumber fees for removal & installation
✗ Potential tile/wall damage
✗ Days without bathroom access
✗ Waste disposal costs
✗ Major disruption and mess

## Technical Details

This website is built with modern technologies:
- **Frontend**: Vite + React + TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS v4
- **Components**: shadcn/ui (new-york style)
- **Animations**: animate-ui components
- **Maps**: Interactive service area map with Leaflet
- **SEO**: Comprehensive schema markup, optimized meta tags, FAQ schema
- **Mobile**: Fully responsive, touch-friendly design
- **Performance**: Fast loading, optimized images
- **Accessibility**: WCAG compliant, keyboard navigation
